name: Space Hunt - Trijam #121
description:
Thanks for checking out 'Space Hunt'. This game was made in 3 hours. I did all the programming, and most the sound effects. All other assets used I noted below.

This game was made for Trijam #121. The theme was "Spacetime Exploration". I really struggled with the theme for a while, but I feel this game really hits the "nail on the head".

Your goal is to find your little space buddy who is floating around between planets. The goal is to finish the game with the LOWEST score possible (the longer it takes, the higher your score goes).

Assets Used:

  • Got my Space Man here
  • Background and Environment
  • Button Click Sound

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
